text: The 2003 World Men's Curling Championship (branded as 2003 Ford World Men's Curling Championship for sponsorship reasons) was held at the Winnipeg Arena in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada from April 5–13, 2003. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" !bgcolor="#efefef" width="200"| !bgcolor="#efefef" width="200"| !bgcolor="#efefef" width="200"| !bgcolor="#efefef" width="200"| |- |Avonair CC, Edmonton,
